mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FISHBOARD ( FISHING_NO, FISHING_TITLE, FISHING_WRITER, FISHING_CONTENT, FISHING_COUNT, RMEM_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_FISH_NO.NEXTVAL, #{fishingTitle}, #{fishingWriter}, #{fishingContent}, #{fishingCount}, #{rmemNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FISHBOARD WHERE FISHING_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT FB.FISHING_NO, AT.CHANGE_NAME, FB.FISHING_TITLE, FB.FISHING_WRITER, FB.FISHING_COUNT, TO_CHAR(FB.FISHING_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "FISHING_CREATE_DATE" FROM FISHBOARD FB JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON FB.FISHING_NO = AT.RFISHING_NO WHERE FB.FISHING_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FB.FISHING_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE FISHBOARD SET FISHING_COUNT = FISHING_COUNT + 1 WHERE FISHING_NO = #{fishingNo} AND FISHING_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT FB.FISHING_NO ,FB.FISHING_TITLE ,FB.FISHING_WRITER ,FB.FISHING_CONTENT ,FB.FISHING_COUNT ,AT.CHANGE_NAME ,AT.ORIGIN_NAME ,TO_CHAR(FB.FISHING_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "FISHING_CREATE_DATE" FROM FISHBOARD FB INNER JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON FB.FISHING_NO = AT.RFISHING_NO WHERE FB.FISHING_STATUS = 'Y' AND FB.FISHING_NO = #{fishingNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FISHBOARD WHERE FISHING_STATUS = 'Y'
AND FISHING_TITLE
AND FISHING_WRITER
LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT F.FISHING_NO ,F.FISHING_TITLE ,F.FISHING_COUNT ,F.FISHING_WRITER ,F.FISHING_CREATE_DATE ,A.ORIGIN_NAME ,A.CHANGE_NAME FROM FISHBOARD F JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON F.FISHING_NO = A.RFISHING_NO WHERE F.FISHING_STATUS = 'Y'
AND FISHING_TITLE
AND FISHING_WRITER
LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY FISHING_NO DESC
SELECT FISHING_NO, FISHING_TITLE FROM FISHBOARD WHERE FISHING_STATUS = 'Y' AND FISHING_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND ROWNUM <= 2

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT FB.FISHING_NO, AT.CHANGE_NAME, FB.FISHING_TITLE, FB.FISHING_WRITER, FB.FISHING_COUNT, TO_CHAR(FB.FISHING_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "FISHING_CREATE_DATE" FROM FISHBOARD FB JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON FB.FISHING_NO = AT.RFISHING_NO WHERE FISHING_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FB.FISHING_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
